game.name: The Crazy Hyper-Dungeon Chronicles
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Hyper‑Dungeon awaits! Explore an evershifting labyrinth where classic dungeon‑crawling meets exhilarating action. Challenge yourself in turn-based combat with a real‑time, arcade‑inspired twist and befriend an eccentric cast of dungeon dwellers on the quest for the legendary Sacred Groowl!
